original_text: Anyone who hates other believers is like someone who murders other people. You know that a person like that does not have true life with God.
korean_text: 그 형제를 미워하는 자마다 살인하는 자니 살인하는 자마다 영생이 그 속에 거하지 아니하는 것을 너희가 아는 바라

sentences.original_text: is like someone who murders other people
You know that a person like that
does not have true life with God
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님과 참된 생명을 갖지 못한다는 것을 압니다
